title: Can singed gain "Grounding" with his sticky goo
body: Singed hasnt been looked at in a very very long time and I think that this would be appropriate.

replies.body: I'm all for this but he's far from in need of buffs at the moment.

Yes, he's doing fine. High elo Singed players abuse {{item:1082}} {{item:1082}} {{item:1082}} {{item:1082}} (yes that's right 4 of them) and can snowball almost any lane.
Can someone explain the dark seal trick to me? I'm confused

You buy these and pots and the healing from dark seals stack. One pot will heal for twice as much as a regular pot. Plus you get the 15 bonus ap for each so its 60 ap and double healing on pots for a low price.

Let's recap. With 4 Dark Seals:
+ 60 AP
+ 100% bonus healing from pots (Singed also rushes Corrupting Potion)
+ 400 Mana (which in turn gives 100 health)
+ AP on takedowns (doesn't stack)
+ Each seal only costs 350g, while it sells for 70% of its price (in comparison, Doran's items only sell for 40%, that's why you can't stack more than 2 or 3 of them on others.)

My problem with this is that Singed really wouldn't inherently benefit from having grounded on his W. Cassiopeia is able to get a lot more damage output out by keeping someone in the Miasma due to them being slowed while she can spam E for "free" on them. Singed on the other hand wouldn't get anything out of it since he only has to refresh his poison every 2 (?) seconds and turning off flashes and stuff doesn't mean anything when Singed can follow flashes extremely easily to begin with due to him having the movement speed of Sonic the god damn hedgehog.
The benefit would be predominantly about setting up kills for teammates.
Shloop them on the goo and keep them from dashing out of the gas or back to you
Shlooping them on the goo already roots them though.

I'd love to see that as it would make singed alot stronger.

But...

He'd become incredibly oppressive. Right now Singed isn't considered good by most people because they don't give him a closer look. (talking silver elo here) People think he does 0 Damage because it's DoT and think he just doesn't bring anything else. 
If you give him a closer look, and adapt to his playstyle, you'll see he often does as much damage as a carry, is extremely tanky, and his Ult is the most overloaded ability in the game (imo). However combining everything in his kit you get a champ who right now is not OP and not garbage either.

So he doesn't need the buff, if singed gets ahead right now chances are that if the rest of the game goes even he'll be stompin. He becomes extremely oppressive when ahead. Giving him grounded will make him a lot stronger as a lot of characters who deal well with him are the ones that can kite and harass him (Kayle/Teemo for example). This will lead to people crying about Singed, especially because he does so much better in Solo/duo than 5v5 Teams. And the next thing riot will do is gut him. And if that happens i'll be sad.

So Singed can use it, he doesn't need it. I'd rather not take the risk of making him oppressive which will probably lead to nerfs to his q or ult more likely than just reverting the grounding.
